text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host. Welcome to our phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet. Isn’t that cool?
They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
Say a big hello to Miss Y.

Y Y Y I’m Miss Y.
Do say hello, don’t be shy.
Meet my friend, Mr. Yak Carrying a sack on his back
A Y Y Y Y Yak, A Y Y Y Y Yak.
My favorite dress has a bow It’s a lovely colour yellow
Y Y Y yellow, Y Y Y yellow
For the seas, my uncle bought a big and beautiful special yacht
A Y Y Y Y yacht, A Y Y Y Y yacht
Up and down, high and low goes my shiny yellow yo-yo.
A Y Y Y yo-yo, A Y Y Y yo-yo.
My torn socks, I need to darn with the same color woollen yarn
Y Y Y Y yarn, Y Y Y Y yarn.
The poor egg fell and broke and out came pouring all its yolk
Y Y Y Y yolk Y Y Y Y yolk
Yogurt is healthy and yummy keeps you well and cools your tummy
A Y Y Y yogurt, A Y Y Y yogurt
I like to stretch and yawn when I wake up at the crack of dawn
A Y Y Y Y yawn, A Y Y Y Y yawn
People like to do yoga It’s funnier if they wear a toga.
Y Y Y Y yoga, A Y Y Y Y yoga.

Would you like to have some yam
I can coat it with some strawberry jam
A Y Y Y Y yam, A Y Y Y Y yam.
Judges give a Y Y yell what is the score, please do tell.
You are amazing!
You are awesome
You are wonderful!
You Rock!
Thank you Miss Y, and you Awesome Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
